description:
A lightweight shirt designed to perform and protect on the water, on the trail, or around town.
Touch-activated cooling fabric combines with sweat-activated evaporative cooling in our most advanced cooling tech yet.
Four-way comfort stretch, moisture-wicking fabric, and built-in UPF 50 deliver all-day comfort....
name: Columbia Sportswear Zero Ice Cirro-Cool SS Shirt - Tall - Mens
